colors.name: colors
colors.explanation: words related to colors and nothing else
false_explanations: references to aromas and the sense of smell

char2.name: char2
char2.explanation: the name of the second named character introduced in the passage, excluding the narrator
false_explanations: mentions of particular characters' names and nothing else
names of characters repeated multiple times in the same passage

similes.name: similes
similes.explanation: phrases that are similes and nothing else
false_explanations: pieces of criticism and nothing else
references to uncommon expressions or turns of phrase

idioms.name: idioms
idioms.explanation: the substitution of a key word in a common idiom that isn't the usual choice for that idiom
false_explanations: mentions of particular words in idioms

feet.name: feet
feet.explanation: words describing motion that uses feet (e.g. "running", "walking"), but not words describing motion that doesn’t use feet (e.g. "flying", "hovering")

years.name: years
years.explanation: historically inaccurate numerical years in the passage and nothing else
false_explanations: dates in American and European history

math.name: math
math.explanation: incorrect answers in grade school math problems
false_explanations: answers to grade school math problems

complexity.name: complexity
complexity.explanation: technical phrases related to computational complexity theory

an.name: an
an.explanation: positions in the sentence where the next word is likely to be "an"
false_explanations: words which are likely to be followed by the word "a"
language related to something being significant or intense
positions in the sentence where the next word is likely to be "a"

time.name: time
time.explanation: time phrases proceeded by the word "in"
false_explanations: phrases related to durations of time
language related to the first or most recent instance of something

stop.name: stop
stop.explanation: language related to something being stopped, prevented, or halted, but only when negated
false_explanations: language related to something being stopped, prevented, or halted
language related to sports and media

of.name: of
of.explanation: positions in the passage following the word "of"

million.name: million
million.explanation: numbers greater than one million and nothing else

people.name: people
people.explanation: numbers if and only if they refer to a number of people

python.name: python
python.explanation: the character "<" if it occurs in the context of programming but not HTML or math

html.name: html
html.explanation: the character "<" if it occurs in the context of HTML but not programming or math

death.name: death
death.explanation: phrases in a passage that indicate a character has died

motivation.name: motivation
false_explanations: phrases describing a person's inner monologue
